title: St Anthony PK studio on Green Line, UMN, Hamline, St. Thomas
posting_body: ['St Anthony Park Studio 1 block to Green Line, UMN, Hamline, St Thomas', 'Property Address', '2400 Myrtle Ave | 7 | St. Paul, MN 55114', 'Available:', '09/01/2022', 'Offered By', 'MBJ Development Corporation |', 'show contact info', 'Description', 'This attractive garden level studio apartment is conveniently located near Highway 280 and University Ave one block from the Green Line so is a perfect location for students attending the U of M or one of the St. Paul Area colleges.', 'The amenities include on site laundry, free storage, brand new refrigerator,  tiled floors.', ' The rent includes heat, water, and trash.', " To apply we require a $45.00 application fee, one full year of rental history, no UD's or major criminal history, income double the amount of the rent, and  and a credit score 620 and higher deposit  and lease.", ' We allow one person only in a Studio.', 'We allow cats and  dogs  for additional rent and and one time pet fee of $200.00.', ' In sum cases we can accept additional deposit or a co-signer for 1st time rents or those lacking one of our requirements.', 'This is a smoke free building.', 'Check out all of our classic apartments or to apply on-line go to <URL>', 'Amenities', 'Refrigerator', 'Stove', 'Tile flooring', 'Remodeled kitchen', 'on-line rent payment', 'free storage', 'newer appliances', 'on site laundry', '24 hour emergency maintenance', 'Many shops nearby', 'On Short Line', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 1.0BA', 'Square Feet: 360', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $730.00', 'Available:', '09/01/2022', 'Application Fee: $45.00', 'Security Deposit: $730.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Dogs allowed']
